sentence: to get things started, i thought i could provide some background on recent monetary policy decisions.1 as you all know, at our december meeting the federal open market committee (fomc) decided to raise the target range for the federal funds rate by 1/4 percentage point, to 1/4 to 1/2 percent.2 at our meeting in january, we decided to maintain that range.
